title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion: Hungry code assist
OB: The code assist feature is adding an extra `foo()` after `x.foo()` in the `baz` call.
EB: The code should only add `x.foo()` in the `baz` call, without the additional `foo()`. The code should be changed to `baz(x.foo())`.
SR:
1. Change the `baz` call to `baz(x.x.foo())`
2. Place the cursor after the first `x.`
3. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up code assist
4. Type `f` to filter the list
5. Select `foo()`
